seedGroups.name: Beaks
seedGroups.description: Beaks are a subset of the shaker group, with seed capsules that split open like a beak when the seeds are ripe. Collect when beaks are open.

species.description: Beaks. This rare plant has fiery red petals, notched at the tips. The peak of the sticky beak will split open and the brown seeds will easily spill into your hand. Short-lived perennial.
